Text: Hi guys... Love all the 1080p PS3 movies uploaded. However, cannot get sound from any of the AAC encoded files in my PS3. How do I solve this?
Go into the sound settings on the ps3 and uncheck AAC. You may need to re enable it to see movies encoded in AC3.

in sweden copyright laws are different and the founders arn't the only ones running the site ;) The Bay will never die because its to connected and organised. And downloaders cannot be prosicuted because its hard to track individuals and pointless to arresting a downloader does not really effect the pirating business therefore not worth the hassle or money of a prosicution. Think about it if 1000 people download this each person would only really be affecting 0.0001% of it. Its the uploaders that have a higher risk, but with so many varients and torrents of the same thing its lowered and most companys or copyright holders wont chase them down because its just not worth it when someone else will put up what that person put up. :P
